name: Elise
title: the Spider Queen
shortBio: Elise is a deadly predator who dwells in a shuttered, lightless palace, deep within the oldest city of Noxus. Once mortal, she was the mistress of a powerful house, but the bite of a vile demigod transformed her into something beautiful, yet utterly inhuman—a spider-like creature, drawing unsuspecting prey into her web. To maintain her eternal youth, Elise now prefers to feed upon the naive and the faithless, and there are few who can resist her seductions.

skins.name: Death Blossom Elise
skins.description: An enchanting beauty she is, lithe in form, and colored like the flowering valleys frozen mid-bloom by winter's chill. Yet the creature Elise dines upon the flesh of maidens, allured by her delicate pulchritude, who dance softly into the jaws of a monster.

skins.name: Victorious Elise
skins.description: Victorious Elise was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2013 season. Spin a wicked web for your enemies in gold-trimmed armor and deep purple robes, and chuckle as they struggle.

skins.name: Blood Moon Elise
skins.description: A revered priestess of the Blood Moon cult, Elise has so wholly intertwined her body with her demon spirit that they are now a single entity. She has traveled beyond all known civilization, existing in the apocryphal darkness hanging beyond the precipice of the world.

skins.name: SKT T1 Elise
skins.description: Honoring Bengi's winning performance as Elise during the 2015 World Championship. This is Bengi's second World Champion skin, following his win with SKT at the 2013 World Championship.

skins.name: Super Galaxy Elise
skins.description: Once a promising cadet, Elise discovered that her metamorphic power enabled her transformation into a mechanical arachnoid at will. Now, she seeks to reign as an evil, immortal Spider Queen—seeing all the galaxy not as a home to defend, but a realm to be conquered.

skins.name: Bewitching Elise

chromas.name: Bewitching Elise (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: A witch of some renown, Elise is widely feared by trick-or-treaters after that whole “human-sized cocoons” incident.

skins.name: Withered Rose Elise

chromas.name: Withered Rose Elise (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: Withered Rose Elise (Paragon)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as an exclusive drop from The Sanctum.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as an exclusive drop from The Sanctum.

skins.description: Elise is in attendance at every annual gala, despite never once receiving a formal invitation. Rumor has it she's been blacklisted for spinning webs of lies, forming and disbanding allegiances in the span of a single evening. Attendees have also noted her suitors never seem to make a return visit to the festival.

skins.name: Coven Elise

chromas.name: Coven Elise (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: Coven Elise (Profane)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

skins.description: They came to Elise long ago, crawling through the underbrush, their many eyes locked with hers as a deal was made. The unfathomable powers of an Old God for her devotion and humanity. Reborn in the image of an arachnoid deity, Elise lingers along the edges of the Elderwood, enticing to their doom all those foolish enough to believe her a mere folktale.

skins.name: Masque of the Black Rose Elise
skins.description: Lady Elise, I trust your preparations for the Silken Danse are proceeding smoothly. A fine mistress-of-ceremonies you shall be. You must be. Your houses have weaved a vast web, but gossamer is delicate, especially with the rise of the new Grand General. Be vigilant. Let no thorn pierce our flowers. (The letter is stamped with a rose symbol.)

passive.name: Spider Queen
passive.description:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

spells.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
spells.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
spells.dynamicDescription: <keywordMajor>Human Form</keywordMajor>: Elise injects neurotoxin, dealing <magicDamage>@BaseDamage@ plus @HumanPercentHealth@ current Health magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
spells.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
spells.dynamicDescription: <keywordMajor>Human Form</keywordMajor>: Elise summons an explosive spider that moves to a location and explodes when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds. The spider deals <magicDamage>@spell.EliseHumanW:TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Cocoon / Rappel
spells.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.
spells.dynamicDescription: <keywordMajor>Human Form</keywordMajor>: Elise fires a cocoon, <status>Stunning</status> and revealing the first enemy hit for @StunDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Spider Form
spells.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for Move Speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
spells.dynamicDescription: <keywordMajor>Human Form</keywordMajor>: Elise transforms into a menacing spider, becoming melee, gaining access to <keywordMajor>Spider Form</keywordMajor> Abilities and summons all dormant <keywordMajor>Spiderlings</keywordMajor>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
